ygData.subject: Buying and Selling Songs
ygData.msgSnippet: I also got burned by the one lore item limitation.  I tried to buy two copies of two songs in Kelthin and paid for all four but only ended up with one copy of
ygData.messageBody:
I also got burned by the one lore item limitation. I tried to buy two copies of
two songs in Kelthin and paid for all four but only ended up with one copy of
each. I petitioned and was told, in essence, tough luck. Thanks for the great
documentation Verant. It appears that this has been corrected a little. I put
a copy of a song in the bank and tried to purchase another copy and it would not
sell it to me. Good work Verant. I still want my platinum back.

I do not know if I can buy a song that I have already scribed. Has anyone tried
that?

Narcissus of Povar, Bard of the 17th Song
